20110109192717.000|20110109192720.000|TR0|opened fire at a meet-and- greet with 
20110109192720.000|20110109192722.000|TR0|Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords.  She was

20110109192727.000|20110109192730.000|TR0|only one still in intensive care.

20110109192751.000|20110109192754.000|TR0|UNIVERSITY OF ARIZONA: The things that are 
20110109192754.000|20110109192756.000|TR0|most concerning to us are if the bullet 
20110109192756.000|20110109192759.000|TR0|crosses from one hemisphere to the other, 
20110109192759.000|20110109192801.000|TR0|one side to the other, if the bullet 
20110109192801.000|20110109192804.000|TR0|crosses through the geometric center of 
20110109192804.000|20110109192807.000|TR0|the brain.  And I'm happy to say that 
20110109192807.000|20110109192809.000|TR0|those were not the case in this instance.  
20110109192809.000|20110109192812.000|TR0|And because of that, Congresswoman

20110109193541.000|20110109193544.000|TR0|JACQUI JERAS, AMS METEOROLOGIST:  Well, 
20110109193544.000|20110109193546.000|TR0|Fredricka.  This is a really big storm and 
20110109193546.000|20110109193549.000|TR0|this is going to impacting millions of 
20110109193549.000|20110109193552.000|TR0|people, not just today, not just tomorrow, 
20110109193552.000|20110109193554.000|TR0|but potentially this storm could 
20110109193554.000|20110109193557.000|TR0|eventually make its way up the northeast 
20110109193557.000|20110109193559.000|TR0|coast and cause more problems there.     
20110109193559.000|20110109193602.000|TR0|So everybody needs to pay attention 
20110109193602.000|20110109193605.000|TR0|because this is going to be a major issue 
20110109193605.000|20110109193607.000|TR0|when it comes to travel and we're talking 
20110109193607.000|20110109193610.000|TR0|about life threatening situations here if

20110109193726.000|20110109193728.000|TR0|precipitation that might come down and it

20110109193754.000|20110109193757.000|TR0|warnings.  This bright purple here is an 
20110109193757.000|20110109193800.000|TR0|ice storm warning and we'll likely see
